name: Running Billboards
tag_list: advertising, mobile-billboard, billboard, billboard-trailer, outdoor-advertising, creative-companies
overview:
Running Billboards is mobile billboard advertising company. Their main goal is to provide clients the most impressive, creative advertising solution at the best possible price. Compared to traditional advertising in a newspaper, which costs from $1500-$3000 per day for a full length color ad, we can provide a client with anywhere from 4-12 full days with their ads being driven around in traffic on our massive mobile billboards. We believe that the customer is and always will be #1, and will do whatever is necessary to prove that to the customer. The only reason we are in business is because of them, and the only reason our customers are in business is because their product or service gains exposure and gets sold, which is what we help them do!

We love to have fun with advertising. We love what we do and love to grow at the fastest rate possible, without sacrificing any customer service or integrity that our company was built on. We love working with people, and know the headaches traditional campaigns can cause companies, which is why Running Billboards was founded in the first place.

We can not stress enough the importance of our customers. Being a entrepreneur, we know the troubles that lack of funding can be to a start-up, and will try to help start-ups as much as possible whether it be with advise, setting up a campaign, or trading resources!

If you have any interest in a campaign, what we do, how we run, or anything at all, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will get back to you within 24hrs!

Thanks! Running Billboards
